featureDescription.name: concept
featureDescription.description: The actual concept of the procedure.

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: Laterality of the procedure, i.e. NULL (default), RIGHT, LEFT, BOTH.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: Procedure status feature, i.e. HISTORY, PLANNED, NEGATED.

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: Temporal information about the actual procedure.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ProcedureCandidate
typeDescription.description: A procedure candidate for a OPS coding.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ProcedureStatus
typeDescription.description: Annotation type for procedure status, i.e. HISTORY, PLANNED, NEGATED.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.ProcedureStatusIndicator
typeDescription.description: Indicator for status of procedure. Interpretation could be e.g. NEGATED, CANCELED, COMNPLETED or PLANNED.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoProcedure
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that this span is no part of a procedure.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoProcedureContext
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby span is no part of a procedure.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.NoProcedureContextBlocker
typeDescription.description: An indicator annotation specifying that a nearby context is applicable for changing the semantic of the procedure.
